external_games.name: Mo Shou Shi Jie: E Mo Lie Ren

name: Mo Shou Shi Jie: E Mo Lie Ren
summary: This game follows the story of Illidan Stormrage, as he works his way from a Night Elf, to a Demon Hunter, and finally an actual Demon. Play out this campaign in 8 bit that takes Illidan throughout Azeroth, and the Outland. Enjoy!
